author: larryi
msg: Update PrintWriterTest test to use a responseMatchFile to verify that the

author: larryi
msg: Added support for a responseMatchFile.  Each line of the "match file" is read
and the response body searched for the presence of that text.  If not found,
the test fails.  If a line containing only "!=" is found, all lines after it are
required not to be found, else the test fails.
Also fixed, I think, needAND handling in DefaultMatcher.

author: larryi

Bugzilla, to indicate that some bugs may not be fixed.  But, as Jon requested,
we need to make sure all bugs are addressed.  None should slip through
